text: Patrick Friou (born 8 January 1955) is a former French racing cyclist. He rode in four editions of the Tour de France between 1978 and 1981. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1955 births Category:Living people Category:French male cyclists Category:People from Saintes, Charente-Maritime Category:Tour de France cyclists Category:Sportspeople from Charente-Maritime
title: Patrick Friou
